Package main.java.it.unipr.model

Class Payment

java.lang.Object
main.java.it.unipr.model.Payment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Payment extends Object implements Serializable
The class Payment provides an implementation of a model of a payment.
Author:
Martina Gualtieri <martina.gualtieri@studenti.unipr.it>, Cristian Cervellera <cristian.cervellera@studenti.unipr.it>

      public Payment(int id, Date date, Member member, Boat boat, RaceRegistration raceRegistration, Fee fee, Date validityStartDate, Date validityEndDate, float total, PaymentService paymentService)
      Class constructor.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the payment.
      date - the date of the payment.
      member - the member who made the payment.
      boat - the boat associated with the payment of the storage fee.
      raceRegistration - the registration to the race associated with the payment of the registration fee.
      fee - the fee to pay.
      validityStartDate - the validity start date of the payment.
      validityEndDate - the validity end date of the payment.
      total - the total of the payment.
      paymentService - the payment service.
